title: Private Credit Sector Expands in Korea With Entry of Hanwha Unit
description: Hanwha Asset Management is expanding into private credit, an asset class still in its early stages in South Korea but continues to attract some of the nation’s largest money managers.
content: Hanwha Asset Management is expanding into private credit, an asset class still in its early stages in South Korea but continues to attract some of the nation’s largest money managers.
